Steps to create the Personal Portfolio Project


  • Plan the layout and structure of the website.
  • Write the HTML code for each page.
  • Style the website using CSS.
  • Add interactivity with JavaScript.
  • Test and deploy the website.



    • Check out this Canva Portfolio Website Maker resource for creating a Personal Portfolio Website.
